intro.subtitle: The end of expensive coding.
intro.paragraph_1: Blockchain shouldn't be exclusive to developers. Until yesterday, launching a token on Solana required Rust expertise or paying thousands to devs. We broke that barrier.
intro.paragraph_2: Nexus Solana is a No-Code platform that lets you Mint your own SPL token in less than 1 minute. Our mission is to democratize access to Web3 for everyone, regardless of technical skill.

use_cases.title: What can you build?
use_cases.description: A token is not just currency; it's a tool for building communities, wealth, and utility.
use_cases.card_1_desc: The most popular trend! Like BONK or WIF. You can create a token for fun, a Telegram community, or just a joke. If a community forms around it, the value can skyrocket.
use_cases.card_2_desc: For serious projects. Use it for in-game currency, subscription access, or DAO governance. These tokens have technical or service-based backing.
use_cases.card_3_desc: Replace paper cards! Give tokens to your customers. They can collect, trade, or redeem them for services.

features.title: Why Nexus Solana?
features.item_1_desc: Only 0.02 SOL service fee. Compare that to $500+ for hiring a developer.
features.item_2_desc: We are non-custodial. We never access your Private Keys. You sign every transaction yourself.
features.item_3_desc: Simple, visual interface. You don't need to know a single line of code.
features.item_4_desc: Powered by the Solana network, your token is minted in milliseconds.

items.question: Is there a cost to mint?
items.answer: Yes, but it's minimal. The Solana network charges a small 'Rent' fee to store your data. Additionally, Nexus charges a flat 0.02 SOL service fee. Total required: ~0.03-0.04 SOL.

items.question: Are these real tokens?
items.answer:
Yes, 100%. You are minting official SPL Tokens on the Solana Blockchain.

Important: For your token to have a price, you must list it on a DEX like Raydium and add Liquidity after minting.

items.question: I'm a beginner. How do I start?
items.answer: 1. Install Phantom Wallet. 2. Buy some SOL. 3. Connect your wallet here. 4. Fill the form and click Mint. Done!

items.question: Do you have access to my wallet?
items.answer: No. Nexus is a decentralized application (Dapp). We don't have a database and cannot access your funds or keys. Transactions happen directly between you and the blockchain.

items.question: Where is the image stored?
items.answer: Your token image is permanently stored on IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) via Pinata. It cannot be deleted or censored.

items.question: Who controls the Authority?
items.answer: You do. By default, both Mint and Freeze Authorities are assigned to your wallet. You have absolute ownership. You can Revoke these authorities later if needed.

items.question: Why Solana instead of Ethereum?
items.answer: Speed and Cost. Minting on Ethereum can cost $50+. On Solana, it's cents. This is why Solana is the home of Meme Coins.

items.question: How do I list on Raydium?
items.answer: After minting here, go to Raydium.io -> Liquidity -> Create Pool. Select your token and pair it with SOL (e.g., 100M tokens + 5 SOL). This creates a market for people to buy.

items.question: Can I update the name/image later?
items.answer: Yes. Nexus tokens adhere to the Metaplex standard with `isMutable: true`. You can update metadata using token management tools, as long as you haven't revoked the update authority.

items.question: Are there geographic restrictions?
items.answer: No. The blockchain knows no borders. Your wallet is your identity. Nexus is available to everyone, globally.
